definition: bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
plucked string or stringed instrument/plucked instrument

sentences.english: The guske music is played on traditional string instrument.
sentences.chinese: 卡搜音乐是在传统的管弦乐器上弹奏的。

sentences.english: The band started to play a 38)twangy tune.
sentences.chinese: 乐队开始弹奏一首拨弦乐。

sentences.english: The orchestra will give two more performances before leaving Britain.
sentences.chinese: 离开英国之前，这个管弦乐队将加演两场。

sentences.english: String Quartet in A minor, Op. 41, No. 1
sentences.chinese: a小调弦乐四重奏，作品41，第一首。

sentences.english: The piece segues into his solo with the strings.
sentences.chinese: 曲终后紧接着就是他的弦乐独奏。

sentences.english: The string quartet was calling, and anyway it would have been bad manners.
sentences.chinese: 弦乐四重奏在召唤，缺席怎么说都太失礼了。

sentences.english: The ship's orchestra's conductor stood to one side, looking peeved but apprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 舰队的管弦乐团指挥站在一边，面色虽愠怒但很知趣。

sentences.english: Well, the Vegetable Orchestra promises just that.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜管弦乐队可以打包票。

sentences.english: Perching on the periphery of every orchestra is a percussion player.
sentences.chinese: 坐在每支管弦乐队外围的是打击乐演奏者。

sentences.english: Beethoven String Quartet, Op. 18, No. 2, final Movement.
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬弦乐四重奏，作品18号，第二首，末乐章。

sentences.english: Poem of the Motherland, cantata for 5 soloists, chorus & orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 为独唱5，合唱队和管弦乐队而作的祖国史诗康塔塔。

sentences.english: A work in which a solo instruments is contrasted and blended with the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 独奏乐器与管弦乐团互相对比和合作的作品。

sentences.english: The kokle is the manic-depressive of the string family.
sentences.chinese: 叩叩琴可以说是弦乐器家族当中的躁狂抑郁症。

sentences.english: After the introduction comes the melody featuring the strings playing in the style of country "fiddlers".
sentences.chinese: 在此引子之后弦乐奏出了“乡村提琴风”的旋律。

sentences.english: Transcription of String Quartet No. 1, for orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 为管弦乐队而改编的第1弦乐四重奏。

sentences.english: Transcription of String Quartet No. 1, for orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 为管弦乐队而改编的第1弦乐四重奏。

definition: double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
to perform on a musical instrument
